description.en_US: Includes a new late-game quest and pet that were once exclusive to the Playstation 4!
description.de_DE: Beinhaltet eine neue Quest und einen neuen Begleiter, einst exklusiv für die Playstation 4!<<C<<Geprüft: Minsu
description.zh_CN: Playstation 4独占，包括一个游戏后期任务和一只宠物！<<A<<[CHANGED 2020/07/15]
description.ja_JP:
Playstation 4だけの
新しい終盤クエストとペット！<<A<<[CHANGED 2020/07/15]
description.ko_KR: Playstation 4 전용 게임 후반 신규 퀘스트와 펫으로 구성되어 있습니다!<<A<<[CHANGED 2020/07/15]
